Logger module

class Logger.Logger(log, non_stop)[source]

Bases: MiniTimer

logIt(message)[source]

Logs a message if logging is enabled.

Parameters:

message (str) – The message to log.

Returns:

None

Return type:

NoneType

should_stop(path, item, trGrinder)[source]

Checks if execution should stop based on the outcome of Z3 model execution.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – The path of the Z3 model file.

  • item – The transition item being processed.

  • trGrinder (TransactionsGrinder) – An instance of TransactionsGrinder containing execution details and output.

Returns:

True if execution should stop due to a failure in Z3 model execution, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

should_stop_if_time_out(o)[source]

Checks if execution should stop due to a timeout.

Parameters:

o (object) – An object that contains a time_out attribute and a transition_processor with timing information.

Returns:

True if execution should stop due to a timeout, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool
